replacements.\"⚙️ Group activation only applies to gr: "⚙️ 群组激活仅适用于群聊。"
replacements.\"⚠️ /session ttl is currently available: "⚠️ /session ttl 目前仅适用于 Discord 线程绑定会话。"
replacements.\"⚠️ /session ttl must be run inside a f: "⚠️ /session ttl 必须在已聚焦的 Discord 线程中运行。"
replacements.\"⚠️ Discord thread bindings are unavail: "⚠️ 此账户的 Discord 线程绑定不可用。"
replacements.\"ℹ️ Session TTL is currently disabled f: "ℹ️ 此聚焦会话的 TTL 当前已禁用。"
replacements.\"⚠️ Failed to update session TTL for th: "⚠️ 更新当前绑定的会话 TTL 失败。"
replacements.\"⚙️ Restarting OpenClaw in-process (SIG: "⚙️ 正在进程内重启 OpenClaw（SIGUSR1），几秒后恢复。"
